description:
Join over 28 million Malaysians who trust TNG eWallet to pay, spend, invest, and manage their everyday financial transactions safely and securely. Regulated by Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM) and Securities Commision Malaysia (SCM), TNG eWallet upholds the highest security standards beyond our industry with biometric logins, multi-factor authentication, and layers of rock-solid protection. TNG eWallet offers a seamless way to handle your finances and elevate your lifestyle — whether it's payments, savings, investments or rewards, all in one powerful digital journey.

GOfinance
An all-in-one financial services hub within your eWallet, designed to transform the way you spend, save, grow, and manage your money. GOfinance offers a comprehensive suite of digital financial services products tailored to meet your needs:
•  Earn daily interest with GO+
• Get essential insurance protection
• Grow your money with a full suite of investment solutions provided by our trusted partners, such as Principal Asset Management, ASNB, CIMB, and Affin Hwang Investment Bank
• Budget and track your expenses effectively with Cash Flow
• Enhance your eWallet’s capabilities with the Touch ‘n Go eWallet Visa Card
• Send money globally with ease via Remittance
• Get the financial boost you need with CashLoan
• Stay on top of your financial well-being with CTOS

GOtravel 
Whether you’re catching a train or booking a seat on the bus, make travelling a breeze with our comprehensive travel products. Spend globally like a local with TNG eWallet, and pay with QR, Visa or even cash! 

Transport 
Skip manual card reloads. With your Touch ‘n Go card in the app, you can pay for tolls and off-street parking straight from your eWallet. 

Bills & Utilities 
Settle your bills — postpaid, utilities, broadband, entertainment, loans, and local council, all from your eWallet. If you are low on credits, you can also reload your prepaid. 

GOrewards 
Get rewarded as you spend with your eWallet and redeem exciting rewards from cashback vouchers to awesome products. Plus, join our monthly lucky draws to win cool prizes. 

Food & Delivery 
Satisfy any craving and have your favourite meals or drinks delivered to your doorstep. 

Entertainment 
Grab your best seats in the cinemas, book handpicked attractions and experiences, and more. 

Shopping 
Shop groceries, electronic gadgets, healthcare and beauty products, and everything you love, and earn cashback while you’re at it! 

Specialty Services 
The TNG eWallet app also offers other specialty services such as Merchant, EZ Qurban, Arus Oil, and more. 

Need help? Our email support is available all day, every day, while our chat support is available from 7am to 10pm daily.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

The Olive fruit is special because it symbolises peacefulness, safety and trust. Olive’s primary drivers are financial inclusions, convenience, security, privacy, the circular economy and long-term sustainability.

Welcome to Baiduri b.Digital Personal!

description:
Takaful Brunei Mobile provides an easy and convenient platform to get quotations, renewals and information on selected Takaful Brunei Am Sdn Bhd (TBA) and Takaful Brunei Keluarga Sdn Bhd (TBK) products through your phone or tablets.

New Features:
• Get Quotations, Renew, make Payments, and make a Claim for your:
   o TBA Musafir (Travel)
   o TBA Private Motor
   o TBA Private Motorcycle
   o TBA Comprehensive Home Package
   o TBA Golfer’s
   o TBA Personal Accident for Active Life
   o TBA All Risk for Bicycle
   o TBA Workmen’s Compensation for Domestic Helper
   o TBA As Syifa’ (Medical)
   o TBA Student Care
   o TBA Personal Accident for Students
   o TBK Nur Savings
   o TBK Aman
   o TBK Aman Plus
   o TBK Credit Card Protection
   o TBK Critical Illness
•  Make Endorsements for your: 
   o TBA Workmen’s Compensation for Domestic Helper
   o TBA As Syifa’ (Medical)
   o TBA Student Care
• Make Monthly Instalment and Contributions for your:
   o TBK Nur Savings
   o TBK Aman Plus

Other Features:
• View information on selected TBA and TBK Products:
   o TBA Musafir (Travel)
   o TBA Private Motor
   o TBA Private Motorcycle
   o TBA Comprehensive Home Package
   o TBA Commercial Fire
   o TBA Golfer’s
   o TBA Personal Accident for Active Life
   o TBA All Risk for Bicycle
   o TBA Workmen’s Compensation for Domestic Helper
   o TBA As Syifa’ (Medical)
   o TBA Student Care
   o TBK Nur Savings
   o TBK Aman
   o TBK Aman Plus
   o TBK Critical Illness
• View and update customer information through the app’s My Takaful
• Keep track of your TBA and TBK history
• Receive notifications on the latest TBA and TBK product promotions
• Emergency contact for 24 Hours Emergency Medical and Travel Assistance and 24/7 Motor Towing and Roadside assistance readily available

Easy & simple app registration, without the need to visit any of our branches

Awards:
• Best Takaful Company Brunei | International Takaful Awards 2017, 2018, 2019
• Digital Insurance Initiative of the Year | Insurance Asia Awards 2020
• Best Takaful Company, Brunei | International Finance Awards 2020
• Brunei's Mobile App of The Year 2022
• Domestic General Insurer of The Year 2022
• Domestic Life Insurer of The Year 2022
________

For more information, please visit our:
• Website: www.takafulbrunei.com.bn
• Facebook / Instagram: TakafulBrunei

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

TAIBVX: Mobile Banking

TAIB Virtual Experience (VX) allows you to access your Perbadanan TAIB account using your mobile device. It gives you the convenience to perform the banking transactions on your device anywhere and anytime.

Below are some of the services that you can perform:

View your Account Detail
View & Download your Account Statements
View your Financing Details
View your Financing Statements
View Term Deposit Details (TDC)
View & Download your Term Deposit Statements
Perform Fund Transfers
- Own Account Transfer
- Internal Transfers
- Domestic Transfers (local 3rd party bank)
- Cross-border (coming soon)

Bill Payments 
- DST Postpaids
- Imagine Pospaids
- Insurans Islam TAIB Family Takaful

Top Up
- EASI Prepaid
- Progresif Prepaid
- DES Electricity

Create and close Standing Instruction
View Payment Status Inquiry

How to get started?

Step 1: Download the application App Store (Apple iTunes)
Step 2: Register for FREE
Step 3: Require personal credentials information for registration
Step 4: Choose your own USER ID and PASSWORD
Step 5: Log in to experience the Mobile Application

It’s time to skip the hassle of any transactions with DANA. Proven #BukanDompetBiasa, DANA enables you to navigate the modern world of cashless and card-less transactions with safe & secure. Making it easier for you to transact, from scanning QRIS, sending money to bank accounts such as BCA, BRI, BNI, mandiri & more, to topping up e-wallet balance like GoPay, OVO & ShopeePay balance, as well as saving your bank cards in the app & use the saved bank cards for any transactions.

Free DANA Balance Top Up
No more worrying about admin fees when you want to top up your DANA Balance. Every penny you top up goes straight into your balance. No hidden fees, no surprises.

Send Money Without Admin Fees
Let’s make money transfers a breeze! You can send money to other users or BCA, BRI, BNI, mandiri & other bank accounts within seconds with 0 admin fees. Skip the hassle of changing apps, you can do it all in DANA! 

Scan QRIS Easily at Any Merchants
Make your QRIS transactions easier & more secure by scanning the QRIS with DANA at your favourite merchants. You can choose to pay your QRIS transaction either with your DANA Balance or your bank cards in the app. It's time for secure & hassle-free QRIS transactions.

Pay with Bank Cards 
Say goodbye to the hassle of carrying a bulky wallet! Save your bank cards to the app and embrace a world of effortless & secure transactions by using the saved bank cards for easier payment. 

Easier Mobile Recharge Purchases & Bill Payments
With DANA, you’re always in control of your communication needs & bill payments. Choose a wide range of mobile service providers with secured and make bill payments faster & easier with just the tap of your finger.

Top Up e-Wallet Balance with Minimal Fees
Top up your other e-wallet balance such as GoPay, OVO & ShopeePay with the lowest admin fee. You can save more while enjoying the convenience of an e-wallet with safe & secure. 

Safer Transaction with DANA Protection 
Transact worry-free with DANA’s layered security: Secure verification process, 24/7 DANA Customer Care & 100% money-back guarantee. DANA is also supervised by Bank Indonesia and Kominfo.

Check Out the Latest Information
Follow DANA’s social media to find out more about the latest features & promotions: Instagram (@dana.id), Twitter (@danawallet) & Facebook (DANA Indonesia).

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

BIBD BizNet Mobile is business banking at your fingertips. With an array of features similar to BIBD BizNet Web Online, BIBD BizNet Mobile is the perfect companion to have whenever and wherever you are.
If you are already a BIBD BizNet Web banking user, simply download this BIBD BizNet Mobile and login using your existing Corporate ID, User ID and PIN along with the security token.

 BizNet Mobile features include:
	•	Account Summary and Transaction History
	•	Fund Transfers within own and third-party BIBD 
                accounts*
	•	Bill Payments*                                                             
	•	Foreign Exchange Rate Inquiry
	•	Approve Payments (My Task)  
	•	Branch and ATM Locator
* Created from Favorite Beneficiaries
 
BizNet Mobile approver(s) can also choose to authorize payments submitted from BIBD BizNet Web online. BizNet Mobile supported approver’s payment types are:
	•	Bill Payments
	•	Bulk Payroll and Bulk Direct Debit
	•	Investment Account Placement and Withdrawal
	•	Fund Transfer within own and third-party BIBD
                accounts
	•	Interbank transfer via RTGS or ACH Direct Credit
	•	Telegraphic Transfer
	•	Top Up for Prepaid Mobile and Electricity.

 To find more about BIBD, please call our Contact Centre at +673-2238181 or visit website www.bibd.com.bn

For over 15 years, XM has been the broker of choice for more than 15 million traders worldwide. We provide instant access to over 1400 instruments with transparent trading conditions, secure funding and award-winning support. 

The XM App gives you all the tools you need to find more trading opportunities and make better trading decisions. From advanced research and charting tools, personalised alerts, and real-time market insights - you have everything you need to act fast on market movements as they happen.

Why choose the XM App
• Ultra-fast execution - Experience faster execution, with no rejections, and no requotes.
• Fair and transparent trading conditions - Trade with no commissions on most accounts, clear pricing, and no hidden fees.
• Secure, instant withdrawals - Withdraw your funds 24/7 through trusted payment methods like bank cards, bank transfers, and other methods. 
• Rely on award winning support  - Connect with us anytime by chat, phone or email.
• 15 years of award-winning trading - XM is a multi-award-winning, multi-regulated broker trusted by millions of traders around the world.

Trading tools and insights
The XM App includes advanced features designed to help you understand the markets, act quickly, and stay informed – all in one seamless app.
• Integrated advanced charting tools - Including smart drawing tools and indicators to analyse markets and make informed trading decisions.
• Explore page - Stay updated with all-day market news, analysis, and insights that help you react quickly to changes.
• Custom watchlists - Organise and track your preferred instruments in watchlists for easy monitoring.
• Notification centre - Set personalised price alerts and receive real-time notifications directly on your device.

Free online trading education
Learn how to trade or sharpen your trading knowledge with our extensive learning resources, including daily Live Education.
•	Interactive webinars and live sessions.
•	Q&A support from trading educators.
•	Exclusive educational content.

Free Demo account
Practice trading with virtual funds, using a free demo account. Learn how the markets
move, test new strategies, and explore the full app experience with zero risk.
•	Trade in real market conditions with virtual cash.
•	Ideal for new and advanced traders alike.
•	No time limits, use the account as long as you want.
•	Switch to live trading anytime.

With the XM App, you can trade, follow market insights, access advanced charting, set alerts, fund and manage your XM accounts anywhere you are, at any time. 

Download the XM App today.

T&Cs apply.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

東日本旅客鉄道株式会社(JR東日本)が提供するSuicaをApple Payで利用するためのアプリです。Suicaの発行やチャージ、定期券の購入もアプリで完結します。スマホを「かざすだけ」で鉄道・バスの乗車やキャッシュレス決済をスムーズにご利用いただけます。「JRE POINT」に登録すれば、JR東日本の鉄道に乗るとポイントが貯まります。また、貯まったポイントをSuicaにチャージすることも可能です。

【Suicaアプリケーションでできること】
iPhone*とクレジットカードがあればSuicaアプリで簡単にキャッシュレス生活を始められます。お手元にSuicaカードがなくても、Suicaアプリにて新規発行することが可能です。Suicaカードをお持ちの場合は、iPhoneでApple Payに取り込んで利用できます。iPhoneとペアリングすることで、Apple Watch*でも利用可能です。

入会金、年会費、デポジット等はいただきません。
* iPhone 8以降のiPhone、Apple Watch Series 3以降のApple Watch、日本国内で発売されたiPhone 7及びApple Watch Series 2の機種が対象です。

決済手段は下記の2つが選べます。
・ Suicaアプリケーションに登録のクレジットカード*
・ Apple Payに設定したクレジットカード
　* ビューカードを登録いただくと「オートチャージ」も設定できます


■ 日本全国で使えます
・全国の鉄道・バスなどの交通機関*でご利用いただけます。
*Suica、PASMO、SAPICA、Kitaca、ICAS nimoca、icsca、りゅーと、TOICA、manaca、ICOCA、PiTaPa、SUGOCA、nimoca、はやかけん、OKICAの各エリア
・ICマークのある日本全国のお店やネットショッピングでのお支払いにもご利用いただけます。

■ Suicaへの入金（チャージ）、定期券、Suicaグリーン券、おトクなきっぷの購入もアプリで
Suicaアプリでは各種サービスを利用できます。
・ Suicaへの入金（チャージ）、オートチャージ設定
・ 電子マネー残高、利用履歴の確認
・ 定期券、Suicaグリーン券、おトクなきっぷの購入・払いもどし
・Suica定期券（カード）の取り込み
・ 領収書の印刷（会員向けウェブサイトにて）

【ご利用にあたって】
・ 困ったときにサポートを受けられるよう、モバイルSuica会員登録をお済ませください。
・ モバイルSuica会員は、紛失や端末故障時は会員向けウェブサイトから再発行登録（利用停止手続き）が可能です。
・ info@mobilesuica.comのメールを受信できるように設定してください。

◆ 重要なお知らせ ◆
【！】 端末を変更・交換する時は、以下の操作が必要です。
・ iPhoneは、旧端末のWalletで全てのSuicaを「削除」し、新端末で同じApple IDにサインイン後、Walletで「Suicaを追加」してください。
・ Apple Watchは、ペアリングを解除する前にiPhoneのWatch appまたはApple WatchのWalletで全てのSuicaを「削除」し、同じApple IDにサインインしているiPhoneと新端末をペアリング後、Watch appで「Suicaを追加」してください。
・Apple社製端末以外からの変更は、予め旧端末での手続きが必要です。iPhone/Apple WatchではSuicaを未設定のApple IDでサインインしお受け取りください。

【！】 端末の電源が切れた状態ではSuicaをご利用いただけません
　※鉄道のご利用中(改札内)に電源が切れた場合、ご利用区間の運賃等を現金でお支払いいただきます。

【！】 Suicaのエクスプレスカード設定を忘れずに
生体認証なしで自動改札を通るには「エクスプレスカード設定」が必要です。交通利用以外では生体認証が必要な場合があります。

【様々なアプリやサービスとの連携で、もっと便利に】
■ JRE POINT
「JRE POINT」にモバイルSuicaを登録することで、対象のJRE POINT加盟店やJR東日本の鉄道のご利用でポイントが貯まります。特に鉄道のご利用では、カードタイプのSuicaよりも多くポイントが貯まるのでおトクです。

■ タッチでGo!新幹線
Suicaアプリケーションで「タッチでGo!新幹線」のご利用登録が可能（Suicaカードの取り込みでも設定が引き継がれます）。チャージ残高で新幹線の自由席にご乗車いただけます（事前の予約は不要）。

■ 新幹線eチケットサービス
「えきねっと」に会員登録し、SuicaをICカード情報に登録すると、券売機やみどりの窓口できっぷを受け取ることなく、JR東日本の各新幹線をチケットレスでご利用いただけます。早めのお申込みでおトクな「えきねっとトクだ値」「お先にトクだ値」もご利用可能です。

■ エクスプレス予約
別途ご登録いただくことでとJR東海「エクスプレス予約」もご利用いただけます（有料サービス）。

Budget App is a personal finance app for spending tracking, budget planning and money saving. It will help you reduce expenses, increase savings, and achieve greater financial freedom.
Budget App, the only personal finance app you need: your BUDGET PLANNER, SPENDING TRACKER, and FINANCE TRACKER.
It is free to use, no ads, no privacy peeping.

「MAIN FEATURES」
• Budget Planner – Set budget for categories & sub-categories on a weekly, monthly, or custom basis
• Money Manage – Manage credit, debit, mutual funds, and stock accounts in one place
• Recurring Transactions – Set recurring transactions on a daily, weekly, monthly, or custom basis
• Subscription Manager – Track and manage your subscriptions, find hidden 
• Shared Budgeting – Collaborate with others to track and manage together
• AI Tracking – Smarter tracking with: AI Importing, AI Voice Input & AI Receipt Scan
• Widget App – Record transactions, view stats & charts — right from your widget
• Shortcut Integration - Using shortcut to record transactions with one click
• Budget Calendar – Visualize your day-to-day spending on a calendar view.
• Stats & Charts – Understand your spending patterns with insightful visuals.
• Shared Ledger – Collaborate with others to track and manage shared budget.
• Cloud Sync – Access your data across all your iPhones and iPads seamlessly.
• Export & Import – Export your data as CSV or import from other CSV files.
More features for Budget App is coming~
